com.guardtime.ksi.service

Interface KSIExtendingService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ExtendingHAService, HAService, KSIExtendingClientServiceAdapter

    public interface KSIExtendingService
extends Closeable
    Provides KSI services to communicate with extender(s).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Future<ExtensionResponse> extend(Date aggregationTime, Date publicationTime)
      Used to extend existing signatures.
      Future<ExtenderConfiguration> getExtendingConfiguration()
      Makes the client ask for configuration update.
      List<KSIExtendingService> getSubExtendingServices()
      If the implementation combines multiple clients then this method can be used to get those subservices.
      void registerExtenderConfigurationListener(ConfigurationListener<ExtenderConfiguration> listener)
      Registers a new for the client.

      • Methods inherited from interface java.io.Closeable

        close

    • Method Detail

      • extend

        Future<ExtensionResponse> extend(Date aggregationTime,
                                 Date publicationTime)
                          throws KSIException
        Used to extend existing signatures.
        Parameters:
        aggregationTime - - aggregation time of the existing signature.
        publicationTime - - publication time to which the existing signature is to be extended.
        Returns:
        instance of ExtensionResponseFuture containing calendar chains needed to extend the signature.
        Throws:
        KSIException

      • getSubExtendingServices

        List<KSIExtendingService> getSubExtendingServices()
        If the implementation combines multiple clients then this method can be used to get those subservices. If the implementation is a client that directly connects to a single gateway then it will return an empty list.

      • registerExtenderConfigurationListener

        void registerExtenderConfigurationListener(ConfigurationListener<ExtenderConfiguration> listener)
        Registers a new for the client. Each time client's configuration is update is handled, this listener is called.

      • getExtendingConfiguration

        Future<ExtenderConfiguration> getExtendingConfiguration()
        Makes the client ask for configuration update. On completion of the update config registered ConfigurationListeners are called
        Returns:
        Future of the ExtenderConfiguration
